movie.title: Men in War
movie.description_intro: In Korea, on 6 September 1950, Lieutenant Benson's platoon finds itself isolated in enemy-held territory after a retreat. Soon they are joined by Sergeant Montana, whose overriding concern is caring for his catatonic colonel. Benson and Montana can't stand each other, but together they must get the survivors to Hill 465, where they hope the division is waiting. It's a long, harrowing march, fraught with all the dangers the elusive enemy can summon. Who will survive?
movie.description_full: In Korea, on 6 September 1950, Lieutenant Benson's platoon finds itself isolated in enemy-held territory after a retreat. It's a long, harrowing march, fraught with all the dangers the elusive enemy can summon. Who will survive?

movies.title: Top Dog
movies.summary: London bad boy Billy Evans gets in over his head when he joins a dangerous criminal gang.
movies.description_full: London bad boy Billy Evans gets in over his head when he joins a dangerous criminal gang.
movies.synopsis: London bad boy Billy Evans gets in over his head when he joins a dangerous criminal gang.

movies.title: A.C.O.D.
movies.summary: A.C.O.D. follows a seemingly well-adjusted Adult Child of Divorce (Adam Scott) who is forced to revisit the chaos of his parents' (Catherine O'Hara and Richard Jenkins) bitter divorce all over again after his younger brother (Clark Duke) decides to get married.
movies.description_full: A.C.O.D. follows a seemingly well-adjusted Adult Child of Divorce (Adam Scott) who is forced to revisit the chaos of his parents' (Catherine O'Hara and Richard Jenkins) bitter divorce all over again after his younger brother (Clark Duke) decides to get married.

movies.title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
movies.title_english: The Passion of Joan of Arc
movies.title_long: The Passion of Joan of Arc (1928)
movies.summary: Giovanna is taken to the Inquisition court. . After the accusation of blasphemy continues to pray in ecstasy . A friar thinks that Giovanna is a saint, but is taken away by the soldiers. Giovanna sees a cross in the shadow and feels comforted. She is not considered a daughter of God but a daughter of the devil and is sentenced to torture. Giovanna D 'Arco says that even if she dies she will not deny anything. The eyes are twisted by terror in front of the torture wheel and faint. Giovanna is taken to a bed where they are bleeding. Giovanna feels that she is about to die and asks to be buried in a consecrated area. Giovanna burns at the stake while devoted ladies cry.

movies.title: Heavens Warriors
movies.summary: God has sent down his strongest archangel Michael to retrieve archangel Gabriel who has gone astray and has been tempted to take control of the two powerful boxes that hold the good and evil of mankind. Lucifer is in possession of one box and Gabriel has the possession of the other. As Gabriel spends time on earth, he's fallen to the temptations that also plaque mankind. Can archangel Michael rescue Gabriel in time? Is there redemption for Gabriel? Or has Gabriel become one of God's fallen angels. HOW MANY POWER BOXES ARE THER ?
